name: Search order by product SKU for WooCommerce
author: laboratorio d'Avanguardia

sections.description:
Allows WooCommerce orders to be searched by product SKU.
You can use wildcards (asterisk or underscore) in your search.

Translations in your language

  • English
  • Italian (it_IT)
  • Our plugin is fully WPML Compatible.

Support

If you find any issue, let us know here!

Contributions

Anyone is welcome to contribute to the plugin. There are various ways you can contribute:

Raise an issue on GitHub.

Send us a Pull Request with your bug fixes and/or new features.

Provide feedback and suggestions on enhancements.

Help us to translate the plugin in your language. You can do it here.
sections.installation:
Steps to install this plugin.

Be sure you’re running WooCommerce 2.0+

  1. In the downloaded zip file, there is a folder with name ‘WooCommerce-pdf-invoices-italian-add-on’
  2. Upload the ‘search-order-by-product-sku’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Read the usage instructions in the description.
sections.changelog:
0.2 – 2023-06-09

  • Verifica compatibilità con WooCommerce 7.7.2
  • Verifica compatibilità con WooCommerce High-Performance Order Storage (HPOS)

0.1 – 2017-02-04

  • Initial version of plugin
